pr_title: ported more xtend formatters to java

timeline.message:
ported more xtend formatters to java
code cleanup Xtext Java Formatter

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>

timeline.bodyText: Very nice! One more down. Congratulations @cdietrich!
timeline.author: szarnekow
timeline.diffHunk:

 		</attributes>
